title: Dragonmaster Swain
body:
This skin was not made by me, I simply saw it when looking at some of the other Swain Skins.

I'm just wondering what you guys think of this skin and if you think that RIOT Games should make this the next ultimate skin. Personally, I think the skin and concept around it is just awesome on so many levels.

replies.body: I was meaning to say it would be a bad version of khaleesi, mainly bcz she sucks until she gets bigg-er dragons lel(If swain was her it would be better but they wont do it)
But his r would be mini peasant dragons lol

Pretty much. In fact a lot of Swain's abilities use birds.

(Know his abilities for the second part)
His Q would probably have a little Dragon creating a teather (chain) of fire probably. His W could have a dragon raise a claw to grab whoever is in the AoE. His E could be a fireball or something. His R like you said before would just be awesome, a massive dragon (who I hope would look awesome) just with little dragons flying to his opponents.

The potential for this idea is just limitless.
